author: Blake Schuster
title: MLB Employees to Participate in 10,000-Person Coronavirus Antibody Study
description: Major League Baseball's players and team employees will participate in a widespread study that is looking to test more than 10,000 individuals for COVID-19 antibodies, according to ESPN's  Jeff Passan ...
content:
Al Bello/Getty Images
Major League Baseball's players and team employees will participate in a widespread study that is looking to test more than 10,000 individuals for COVID-19 antibodies, according to ESPN's Jeff Passan.
